title: Dave Lombardo from Slayer, Dead Cross, Suicidal Tendencies and The Misfits
itunes:title: Dave Lombardo from Slayer, Dead Cross, Suicidal Tendencies and The Misfits
description:
Episode 265 - A true gentleman is on the show this week in the form of an incredible drummer, Dave Lombardo. He plays in Slayer, Suicidal Tendencies, Dead Cross and The Misfits. Needless to say, this dude has done a million interviews but he was more than willing to go down roads that he hadn’t before and we got in depth about playing in high pressure situations, being a dad and finding stillness. It’s a great look inside of the mind of a person who shows up to work every day behind his drum kit. Use the code WORDS for 50% off an incredible smile with Smile Direct Club!Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
